result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, Imana yabo Rurema Allah, Iraheza Ikabarongora ku kwemera kwabo, mu nzira yo gukora ivyiza bitegetswe bazohemberwa Ubwami bw’ijuru bwuzuye inema, musi y’ibiti n’inyubakwa vyabwo hatemba inzuzi;
